Civic FAQ

How do I submit a decree that rhymes?

Use paired lines, match closing sound, and file before moonrise for same-night review.

Can businesses sponsor an episode?

Yes. Licensed sponsors may underwrite one segment per quarter with full public disclosure.

What happens if a document fails cadence?

It enters the Calm Redraft Queue and returns with meter guidance from tribunal staff.
